name: Okiku
description: Okiku is a japanese first-person horror game inspired by the real life Okiku doll which is said to grow its own hair and teeth.

name: Cloacaphobia
description: Cloacaphobia is a 90s VHS found footage survival horror that plays on the fear of sewers, realistic situations and claustrophobic environments with a gruesome atmosphere.

name: Defile
description: Discover the story behind the blood queen and bring an end to the evil entity which now inhabits the manor.

name: Sanevol Incident 44
description: Sanevol Incident 44 is a realistic urban exploration VHS Found Footage horror title.

name: Hero Cummy
description:
Enter U.A High, a school for training the next generation of heroes and heroines! Though our hero didn’t enroll just to attend a few classes, a few strange secrets lie below the school’s surface- starting with the mysterious fate of your father.

Unlock the full potential of your quirk’s abilities and all of the lewd powers that come with it. Decide if you’re looking for revenge or answers as you interact with the school’s students and staff. Enjoy a variety of lewd scenes with your favorite characters, and explore a whole range of fun kinks along the way! We hope you enjoy!

name: Lakelight Elementary Incident 68
description: Lakelight Elementary Incident 68 is a realistic urban exploration VHS Found Footage horror title where you unveil the past and afterlife through your camera.

name: Nihil Ignis Incident 48
description: Nihil Ignis Incident 48 is a realistic urban exploration VHS Found Footage horror title.

name: Strongford Penitentiary Lost Tape 91
description: Strongford Penitentiary Lost Tape 91 is a realistic urban exploration VHS Found Footage horror and the first entry in "The Lost Tapes" Series.

name: Moundville Factory Lost Tape 89
description: Moundville Factory Lost Tape 89 is a realistic urban exploration VHS Found Footage horror with emphasis on atmosphere, unpredictability, realism and a non-linear design with multiple endings and outcomes.

name: Durium Hospital Lost Tape 95
description: Durium Hospital Lost Tape 95 is a realistic urban exploration VHS Found Footage horror mixed with survival horror and the third entry in "The Lost Tapes" Series.

name: Silversoul Orphanage
description: Silversoul Orphanage is a standalone realistic urban exploration simulation. A VHS Found Footage Urbex Sim horror with emphasis on atmosphere, unpredictability, realism and a non-linear design with subtle scares, focusing on the feeling of being stalked during an urban exploration.

name: Reef Light Conundrum
description:
Reef Light Conundrum is a standalone realistic urban exploration simulation mixing themes of the paranormal & lovecraftian horror.
A 90s VHS Found Footage Urbex Sim horror with emphasis on atmosphere, unpredictability, realism and a non-linear design, focusing on the feeling of exploring a old haunted ship.

name: Urbex Alone
description: A VHS Found Footage Urbex Simulation horror with emphasis on atmosphere, unpredictability, realism and a non-linear design, focusing on the feeling of providing a realistic solo urban exploration in a abandoned construction building.

name: Zorovan Powerplant
description: A VHS Found Footage Urbex Simulation horror with emphasis on atmosphere, unpredictability, realism, focusing on the feeling of providing a realistic solo urban exploration in a abandoned military owned soviet era powerplant and the feeling of being stalked by aliens.

name: Super Pitfall II
description: A cancelled North American localization of Atlantis no Nazo, rebranding it as part of the Pitfall series.

name: Final Clue Oakloon
description: Final Clue Oakloon is a Gritty Dark VHS Urbex Homicide Detective Survival Horror with combat and emphasis on atmosphere, as well as unpredictability, realism and providing a realistic solo urban exploration in a abandoned overgrown house in the woods & the feeling of being stalked during your investigation for the truth about an old crime case, you will have to fight your way through whoever resides here in order to come to the truth and conclusion of this old case.

name: Ghost Of Wynlow
description: An urban explorer ventures out to explore and investigate the legend of the abandoned Wynlow lighthouse.

name: Don't Pee
description: An adventure game about not peeing your pants, can you survive the scary house?

name: Lingering Souls
description: Lingering Souls is a first-person psychological horror game set inside a recently deceased family relatives post-soviet era apartment.

name: Incident In Oakwood
description: An urban explorer ventures out to an abandoned cabin in the woods that was involved in an unsolved alien abduction case from the 1960s. UFO activity and sightings of extraterrestrial beings have been reported in the area of Oakwood forest dating back all the way to the 1950s.

name: Dead Faces
description: Dead Faces is a mind bending psychological horror about hallucinations and facing your past. Unravel Jack's disturbing mind, the faces from his past and the ultimate truth behind his actions. You must remember their faces.

name: Pripyat Block 1986
description: A VHS Found Footage Urbex Simulation horror with emphasis on atmosphere, unpredictability, realism and a non-linear design, focusing on the feeling of providing a realistic solo urban exploration in a abandoned apartment building.

name: Star Revenge 5.5: Destroyed Memories
description:
Star Revenge 5.5: Destroyed Memories is a Rom Hack made by Brodute and released in 2018.

It is a Remix of Star Revenge 5 with 70 Stars.
The main courses are edited versions of Star Revenge 5's main courses, while the side courses are completely new levels.

Stars found in the main courses are all hidden, like the green stars in Super Mario Galaxy 2.

name: Elf Kicker
description: Punch and kick Santa's elves through a winter themed backdrop with relaxing Christmas music.

name: NightFall Shade
description: 2D real-time survival action. A somber journey through lands ravaged by a long siege. Extensive and complex combat, hardcore survival and deep immersion. Heal the heart of an old castle... or share its darkness.

name: Mini Star Imposters
description: Mini Star Imposters is a game where you have to find and kill all 4 Imposters hiding among 16 others within the time limit. Use your intuition, memory, and luck to find and kill the 4 Imposters.

name: The Paper Trials Chapter 3
description: A first-person horror maze game. Hiding & Standing still is Death. Run or you are DEAD. Trapped in a realm of nightmarish mazes with your only hope of survival is to find all of the pages to the mysterious book and ESCAPE!

name: Icarus84
description: Recreate yourself and break free from the simulation, in ICARUS84, a focused retro ARPG that will take over your mind and heart, but not your life. Make the build that plays the way you want to play, unravel the mystery behind why you're trapped, and find a way out.

name: Jipoiz
description: Enjoy a fantastic fantasy battle! It's an isometric view PVP action game where you can use various weapons

name: Gozen Yoji no mani-mani
description: Sin descripción

name: TerraKids: Save The World Kidos!
description: Join Fuzzo in TerraKids for an epic eco-adventure! Explore vibrant worlds, learn about our planet, and become an Earth hero. Perfect for young explorers aged 3-7. Let's make the world better, one game at a time!

name: Sub Terra Draconis: Magma Grotto
description: Join a young dragon on his search for hoard! A level pack for Sub Terra Draconis with 30 additional challenges!

name: Guinea Pig
description: Adopt a new pet and embark on this journey to help him find a safe place.

name: Polite animals
description: This is a challenging casual relaxation game.

name: Raven Fighter
description: Raven Fighter is a classic shoot‘em and roguelite game where players can customize their favorite weapons to defeat the final boss. Different weapon combinations result in varied outputs, accompanied by rich visual effects for an enhanced gaming experience.

name: Extermination Shock
description: Space combat sim with physics-based gameplay, personalized AI, in-depth loadouts and customization, and wingman dialogue

name: OverDrift Festival: Police Cars Pack
description: This pack includes 5(!) POLICE cars with 2 unique liveries for each and technically upgraded to SPORT level! Japanese and american police versions! Special sound signal and active flashing lights! 2016 STRONGER P 1999 GODZ-34 P 1993 N240 P 2005 ARSENAL P 1990 5F SEDAN P

name: Colorful Katana
description: Samurai Champloo meets a bloody blend of graffiti and guns. Slice through a hip-hop infused feudal Japan. Cut down revenge-fueled bosses. Paint it red. And blue. And orange. You get the point.

name: Lily & Ghost
description: Sin descripción

name: Toing's Pops 2
description: Toing's Pops 2 is a singleplayer adventure horror game. Save your friend from his isolation while unlocking the secrets to Chardonnay's plans. Become empowered, and prepare to end this all.

name: Our Freedom
description: The medieval world is waiting for you! Stand up for your people and help them protect their freedom! Build your village, win battles and tournaments and become a famous adventurer in the game Our Freedom!

name: Elfin Around
description: Get ready to help Santa in this immersive toy builder game!

name: Horst: Der Ultimatives Rollenspiel
description: This game is one but a bad way to learn german.

name: Five Starless Rivers
description: A point-and-click adventure game featuring an undergraduate student who needs to find the Helm of Hades while also trying to navigate adult life in contemporary Athens.

name: Don't Leave
description: In this game, in which you play the role of the kidnapped judge, many psychological difficulties await you, and despite all this, you try to solve the puzzles and escape from this magical house.

name: King Arthur: Legion IX
description: Dive into a unique blend of turn-based tactics and character-centric RPGs. Lead the skilled Roman tribune Gaius Julius Mento as he navigates through the dark fantasy realm of Avalon.

name: Dash or Die
description: Climb to the top of the world using your special double jump and dash abilities and more !

name: Phantasy Series Reference Opus
description: A turn-based RPG that goes from cheery fantasy to not-so-cheery sci-fi, hopefully with the feel of something straight outta the '90s

name: Don't Go in the woods
description: Defy legends, face a forest monster. solve puzzles, and confront your fears in a chilling battle. Will you conquer the darkness or become a haunting tale?

name: Nyctophobia: Fear the Dark
description: Nyctophobia is a thrilling physiological horror game that challenges players to confront a terrifying SCP that preys on their deepest fears. The game takes place in a neighborhood where players must navigate through the darkness and uncover the mystery behind the strange occurrences.

name: MDF: Magical Defense Force - Chapters 10-18
description: MDF: Magical Defense Force Chapters 10-18 is a unique story focused Magical Girl Visual Novel, featuring a cast of strange and entertaining character, monster of the week action, comedy, a rocking soundtrack and artistically rendered fight scenes.

name: Ocean Gap
description: Dive into a co-op underwater horror game. Find and destroy energy cubes to stop the secret organization's experiments. Don't get lost in dark and deep waters. Don't get caught but breathe!

name: Overgun
description: Try this fast-paced sci-fi shooter as an elite OVERGUN mercenary. Go to the moon base of the EARTH ROBOTICS corporation to destroy an army of various robots under the command of an evil AI.

name: Stress Ball
description: Experience the blend of fun and challenge with Stress Ball! In this 3D ball game, your character bounces through platforms toward the goal. As levels intensify, and a dark theme adds depth to the atmosphere, immerse yourself in the thrill of overcoming increasingly difficult obstacles.

name: Malkin: The Cairn and the Crossroads
description: This thematically gothic DLC adds five new witch classes and other character options to the game, including Wicked Anne, a spell summoning a ghost ally. It also adds encounters, a side quest, and a new enemy type for all players.

name: Revvver
description: Create a path by reversing the desired area.

name: Days Like A Nightmare
description: Who is infected with the parasite 'Rubyuk'? Place sensors, observe the readings, and build your deductions. Then confront the nightmare - mostly in a physical manner. This is a short, scary game that combines reasoning with mini-action.

name: Hoshi no Natchan
description: This is a pixel art 2D action game. Use dash, jump and attack to reach the goal. There are no complicated operations or material collection, so you can start playing right away. It's an easy and kindness game.

name: Planet X16
description: Planet X16 the spiritual successor to the Planet X3 strategy game. You are up against the Protoids again. You need to mine resources, build infrastructure and build offensive units to defeat them. All while protecting your bases now with mouse controls

name: Move Blocks
description: Move Blocks - A calming game in which the player needs to clear the way for the cat in the box so that she can escape! Control with the mouse, click on the desired object and use the direction of the mouse to push them in the directions you need.

name: Hell Spheres
description: Hell Spheres - A game in the Top Down Shooter genre, where the player controls a spherical clot of energy, which must collect other spheres with energy and increase in size, increasing which the player becomes cramped within the level.

name: KO Chaos
description: Slash, shoot, explode, vaporize, smash, and destroy, enemies with eight heroes to use to your advantage! Fight tons of bosses on one of four difficulties in the incredibly difficult souls-like/risk-like. The game takes inspiration from Risk of Rain 2, Dark Souls combat, and Vampire Survivors.

name: T-night
description: A quiet family life ended at the moment when the Doomsday came. Nightmares in the dark have come to life and are thirsting for your blood

name: Galaxy Trek
description: Galaxy Trek is a fun, simple and addictive indie game that will test your reflexes, strategy and skill. Each game you play is unique!

name: Gloomsday
description: Gloomsday is an action-packed roguelite platformer with a unique spellcasting mechanic. Your spellcasting resource is in the world around you--no mana bars here! As you cast your "gloomspells", you'll find the serene, yet gloomy landscape go dark and grey... but the magic will return soon enough.

name: Spider Inferno
description: SPIDER INFERNO is a single player horror third person shooter game. You have to save the world from the professor and the spiders. In 8 missions + 2 bonus levels you have to prove your skills and win. Don't disappoint us. That's why we make you the savior of humanity!

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Baker's Best
description: 2 Brand New Tables with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! Party down with these Night Club themed tables!

name: Phobos Down
description: A sci-fi twin stick shooter stripped down to the bare essentials with focus on smooth controls and satisfying action.

name: PvPillman
description: A topdown and 3rd person game for ideally 5 players.

name: Fire Racing
description: Real Racing game. 6 tracks. A racing game with day, night, and seasons.

name: Keepers Of The Lost Arts
description: This is an endless runner set in a Medieval town and time.

name: Escape From Hata
description: What will happen if a person is overtaken by a global catastrophe during his daily routine? You can find out right now.

name: Fallen's Challenge
description: Experience a Sokoban game like no other! Unique combat, gameplay, puzzles, music, pixel-art, and cutscenes. With the powers of the gems, go on a journey to discover ascension!

name: How Little We Wait
description: In this classic point-and-click adventure you will collect and combine items scattered around an otherworldly room you find yourself trapped in. You only have one minute to escape before the man counts down to zero and the room resets itself.

name: The Rings of Powder: The Weird World of the Elves
description: The "The weird world of the Elves" expansion introduces three new heroes, three new scenarios/challenges and expands the game with new locations and monsters, giving it a more epic size.

name: Prisoners
description: An online game in which players (2-10) sentenced to death try to win their freedom and the grand prize by eliminating others.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Waterfalls 2
description: Puzzles of Waterfalls!

name: Merge Circus
description: Merge small cute animals into bigger cute animals. Measure your skills by playing this puzzle game and achieving the highest score!

name: Trainz Plus: Harvard Subdivision - Commuter Edition
description: The Harvard Subdivision: Commuter Edition route covers the Metra commuter train services from Ogilvie Transportation Center in Chicago, IL to Harvard, IL, a distance of about 85 miles. This route features detailed suburban scenes and open countryside, with 6 different passenger train sessions!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Harvard Subdivision - Commuter Edition
description: The Harvard Subdivision: Commuter Edition route covers the Metra commuter train services from Ogilvie Transportation Center in Chicago, IL to Harvard, IL, a distance of about 85 miles. This route features detailed suburban scenes and open countryside, with 6 different passenger train sessions!

name: The Penguin Horror: Legacy of The Pengcasso
description: Pengcasso, the legendary penguin painter. His paintings have all been stolen by humans and displayed in their art museum. Sneak into the museum, evade the fearsome guards, and retrieve your father's works.

name: Polismos
description: In Polismos you build and manage cities in the ancient Greek world. To ensure your city's prosperity you will need to care for your people, trade valuable resources, enact wise policies, and maybe even dominate other cities.

name: Lakesider: Above and Below
description: Working class weeb Knox's life is forever disturbed after a cute fish girl saves him from drowning himself by accident, introducing him to a strange sunken town hidden beneath the lake. An at times (un)comfortable slice of life turned survival horror you won't want to miss!

name: Flappy Box
description: Atelier 58l0, in collaboration with designer Saul Kim, presents "Architecture Anomaly" in the virtual environment of Flappy Box. A single-player, exploration game of architecture and design, Flappy Box invites visitors to explore the intersection of creativity, curiosity, and design philosophy.

name: Forza Motorsport: 2018 Lamborghini #63 Squadra Corse Huracán Super Trofeo Evo
description: Forza Motorsport 2018 Lamborghini #63 Squadra Corse Huracán Super Trofeo Evo

name: Space Ops Arcade
description: Survive Kepler's alien onslaught. Top-down shooter with epic multiplayer on the way!

name: Crafty Racer
description: Stunt, push, and rush to the end! Win models and change anything as you want! Your tracks, vehicles, characters, checkpoints, opponents, ... anything!

name: Simply Rotate
description: Simply rotate is a minimalist physics puzzle game where you rotate a level to get a ball to reach the goal while saving up on rotation for future stages. Learn the new mechanics introduced in every level and master conserving rotation between levels to reach the goal.

name: Luckcatchers2
description: Luckcatchers2 is a massive, multiplayer, online game in an open world inhabited by fire-breathing dragons. Choose your path. Become a brave adventurer, pirate, bounty hunter, transporter or manufacturer. Live in cities or build your own settlements. Travel on airships or aircraft.

name: Go Deep Or Go Home
description: Dive into a thrilling medieval fantasy adventure as a daring dungeon crawler. Loot dungeons for rare artifacts and treasure, face deadly traps, and battle foul creatures. Decorate your home with the spoils of conquest. Go Deep Or Go Home!

name: Mithra
description: A cryptic puzzle/adventure game that blurs the line between fiction and reality. A tale of cultish affairs that sweeps through the nighttime streets of London, weaves through the back alleys of Beijing and beyond. Come with us.

name: GTH 3033: Grand Theft Hunter 3033
description: Top down shooter game. About a robot monster hunter.

name: Resttore
description: Craft, build and upgrade your character as you explore a fantasy open world full of secrets and help its habitants defeat the creatures that brought this place to its end.

name: ThePoliticalUnderground
description: A Satirical Political Fighting Game

name: The Air Ruler
description: The Air Ruler is a 2D side-scrolling shooter with unique graphics and addictive gameplay, Aeria defies the darkness, reveals the secrets of the underwater kingdom and restores peace and harmony in the waters that he loves and protects.

name: Gold Seeker
description: Gold Seeker is a sandbox game in a small area. You and several other enemy drones are searching for ancient fossils in the depths of the planet's surface. Your tool is a recycling terra laser. Collect as many coins as possible and win this treasure race.

name: Just skill shooter 2
description: Just Skill Shooter 2 is a continuation of the legendary first-person shooter where you take on the role of a soldier fighting enemies in different maps.

name: My Evil Clones
description: My evil clones is a dynamic shooter-puzzle game where players combat armed aggressive clones. Face diverse enemies, use agility and strategy to survive, and prevent a global catastrophe.

name: Into
description: Into is an action puzzle game where players need to explore and decipher to find ways to escape this unfamiliar world. The game is full of unknown creatures and puzzles. The game has multiple endings, and the player's choices and investigations will determine the final outcome.

name: Sixide
description: This is a dice game. Play as a dice to fight against dice enemies in a dice dungeon.

name: Granvir
description: Granvir is an action roguelite featuring mech building. Scavenge the battlefield for parts to replace and upgrade your arms, legs, torso and weaponry. PIlot your Granvir and manage your campaign between battles to find the best equipment and stay supplied.

name: Gravarior
description: Gravarior is a shooting action puzzle game in which the main character, Graver, who can manipulate gravity up and down at will, tries to steal the energy hidden in the depth of a discarded ship. The ship is filled with obstacles and mysterious creatures such as Anoi. Let's overcome the difficulties!

name: CrypticaL
description: An ancient entertainment in a futuristic universe, at least for the audiance. Our main character is a retired soldier who forced to fight in a gladiator arena. Escape, find the responsibles, punish!

name: Legends of Alterra
description: A classic RPG experience with modern strategic battle mechanics. There are over 20 classes to unlock, with the ability to assign sub-classes. Explore the world of Alterra with an array of dynamic characters, and gain allies to help turn the tides of the ongoing fight between humans and elves.

name: Puppeteer's Curse
description: It's a first-person horror room escape game. You have to solve puzzles in a dark atmosphere, avoiding monitors. Never get caught.

name: Farmcoz
description: Cozy Sandbox Game about Farming and Building. It's raining outside? Just chill and relax with warm and cheerful atmosphere of Farmcoz. Farm, Build, Explore, Explode and Unlock all items. Good luck!

name: Holly-Day Ice-Spionage
description: A holiday horde arcade shooter where you freeze enemies to make them attend your boss's botched holiday party!

name: Li-Lo
description: Li-Lo is a single-player puzzle platformer in which you run, jump and solve puzzles to guide your small family through a beautiful and mysterious world. Enjoy bittersweet moments of bonding and growth, before life skips ahead to its next chapter.

name: Berserk High
description: Berserk High is an action RPG in which you defeat numerous enemies with a combination of various skills. The footsteps of the enigmatic wanderer Bella lead to the Furnace of Chaos, where 12 great heroes are confined. She is supposed to endure the most severe trials across the entire universe.

name: Space Traveler's Brain Creator
description: Save your cognitive brain here! Spatial navigation and working memory boost plan. Kill dementia today and everyday.

name: Samuel Sage: The Mystery at Penby Inn
description: Immerse yourself in a thrilling mystery with Samuel Sage, a young man who inherits a charming English hotel. Some would say he’s fortunate, but with a growing list of unexplained disasters and murder, has his luck finally run out?

name: Looped
description: Looped is a short interactive story that lasts around 30 minutes. You will help Him and Her to progress by solving mini-puzzles and clicking your way forward the Chapters. It's a short, peaceful story about love that's perfect to enjoy when you need a break.

name: Meatgrinder
description: MeatGrinder is a mech-shooter themed shooter where you have to pilot and assemble your own mech on a desert planet to fight against ferocious monsters from outer space.

name: Echo Chambers
description: Echo Chamber is a Horror Roguelike Deckbuilder that challeneges your sanity as you shoot down terrors and manage your deck to survive in an ever-changing, procedurally generated world! Can you trust what you've been told?

name: Oneiric
description: Dive into "Oneiric" a charming walking simulator. Play as a 7-year-old boy exploring a nostalgic world of dreams and solve the riddles in a single enchanting night. Short nap, thats 15 minutes game experience focused on visual aspect.

name: Saving Astral
description: Somewhere among the stars awaits a remedy for your Mother. Search a vast mysterious Planet on the verge of collapse while fighting to survive. What perils await you? What will become of the Planet? What legacy will you carve into the skies? What fate awaits your Mother.

name: Silent Nightmares: A Christmas Story
description: Make your way through the chilling realm of survival horror, where immersive visuals, gripping first-person gameplay, and expertly crafted narratives converge to deliver a heightened sense of realism to the terror you'll encounter.

name: Survive It: Frozen
description: Can you lead four different survivors despite threats in a hostile winter area? Join the strategic multiplayer challenge! Survive It: Frozen is a small indie game that comes with a new and unique gameplay concept combining survival and real time strategy.

name: Seekboss
description: A harvesting game, you need to find the BOSS and defeat it

name: Spherix
description: Spherix combines creature collection with thrilling real-time action combat in a vibrant MMO open world. Capture, battle, evolve and customize your Spherix. Explore dungeons, complete quests, unveil mysteries and build the most powerful team. A new adventure awaits. Are you ready?

name: Trainz Plus: LMS/NSR Wagon Pack 1
description: This pack contains a selection of different types of wagons in both LMS liveries and North Staffordshire liveries. Wagons included are 1 plank, 2 plank, 3 plank, loco coal 3 plank, loco coal 5 plank, 6 plank, 7 plank, 15t wood/rail wagon and 20t brake van; each with custom features and options.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: LMS/NSR Wagon Pack 1
description: This pack contains a selection of different types of wagons in both LMS liveries and North Staffordshire liveries. Wagons included are 1 plank, 2 plank, 3 plank, loco coal 3 plank, loco coal 5 plank, 6 plank, 7 plank, 15t wood/rail wagon and 20t brake van; each with custom features and options.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: LMS/NSR Wagon Pack 1
description: This pack contains a selection of different types of wagons in both LMS liveries and North Staffordshire liveries. Wagons included are 1 plank, 2 plank, 3 plank, loco coal 3 plank, loco coal 5 plank, 6 plank, 7 plank, 15t wood/rail wagon and 20t brake van; each with custom features and options.

name: Kosmobreak
description: Kosmobreak is an immersive game that plunges players into the heart of an abandoned spaceship infested with mysterious extraterrestrial life forms.

name: Controware
description: Controware is a game that will take you into the fascinating world of space warfare and allow you to become a real warlord.

name: Protecto
description: Protecto must protect ugly human polluters from nature's vengeful attacks!

name: Hire Me!
description: Dream Big, Apply Recklessly! Welcome to the whimsical, wacky and slightly weird world of AllJobs Agency, where 'All' is not just a catchy prefix. Choose any job you want — or even make one up — and brace yourself for the most relentless job interview of your life.

name: Samurai Ninja Wars
description: Samurai Ninja Wars is a fast paced, blood soaked, action platformer. Run, jump, dodge, block, and slash your way through dozens of challenging levels. The enemies and hazards are ruthless, but so are you. Cut through your enemies, and follow the way of the Samurai.

name: Tiny Tales: Hidden Objects
description: Explore charming scenarios, find 3, 5, or 7 hidden objects in 20 stunning levels. Become a master in the search for carefully concealed secrets.

name: Iskhaar3D
description: An in-depth space and economy simulation meets simple twin-stick controls. Iskhaari people have been exiled by the Khanid Emperor to a contested region of the galaxy. Through the means of military, economy and politics conquer this region for the House of Iskhaar.

name: Mushroom Kid's Big Grass Sword
description: Play as a mushroom kid on a journey to save their village with a sword that grows! Meet wacky characters and wield the Blade of Grass: a magical sword you can use to scale walls and swing around danger. Watch as it grows to comical lengths and stop the bird that captured the mushroom people! ️

name: Growth Experiment
description: "In a certain apartment room, 'I' began a life with 'Chloe,' who had lost intelligence and memory. By navigating between the present and the past, it becomes clear what happened to the deteriorated 'Chloe.' Whether you interpret the ending as a happy one is entirely up to you."

name: Save the throne
description: In save the throne you will build up your defenses and shoot skeletons to save the throne against ever increasing waves of skeletons.

name: Shadow of the Curse-Eater
description: The wilderfolk of Ushinega Island waste away in a rotting tropical paradise, haunted by a deadly malediction. Yet behind every curse lurks a secret. You have the power to save them... but should you?

name: Circlebrix: Falling Bricks
description: Circular falling-brick puzzle action. Can you solve the circle?

name: Covid19: Toilet Paper Run
description: Set in the early stage of COVID-19 pandemic, this third person "shooter" has you disinfect your way through coronavirus infested city square using hand sanitizer filled spray bottles. Now's your chance to get back at the virus that affected us all (and help Jeff get some toilet paper in the process)

name: Eternal Space
description: Eternal Space is a city builder and space exploration/combat game. Explore the Eternal Space, and manage your city while you fight pirates, or maybe even become a pirate! Keep your citizens happy, and collect taxes from them each year for a little bonus!

name: Solstale
description: Solstale will take you on a whimsical 2D platformer adventure . Run, jump, and explore vibrant levels with friends. It's more than a game; it's a heartwarming journey into a hand-drawn universe.

name: Tower Tactics Arena
description: Tower Tactics Arena is an action roguelite set in the Tower Tactics: Liberation universe in which you'll fight intense waves of enemies in a closed combat arena! Level up your towers strategically and collect powerful trinkets and potions! Will you claim victory in the arena?

name: Hidden Object Chronicles: Poisoned Truth - Collector's Edition
description: Immerse yourself in the tangled web of family dynamics, discovering long-held secrets and uncovering motives hidden beneath the surface!

name: Discrete Heart
description: Discrete Heart is an emotion-building game in a 2D pixel style from a top-down perspective. Joy, trust, fear... Each initial emotion corresponds to different initial attributes and props. "Inject" and control the characters to build 8 basic emotions, looking for the answer named "Unintentionaler".

name: Robot Adventure
description: Join IP-One in his adventure to escape the facility. Filled with autobots, moving platforms to jump across, flying UFOS and all other manner of foes that block your path!

name: Life Blood
description: You awaken on the Altar inside the Life Cathedral. Venture down into the mountainous kingdom in this first-person, souls-like experience with focus on exploration. loot villages on the cliffside, navigate the spiraling stone dungeons, and unseal the secrets hidden within the heart of the mountain.

name: Shinobi Saga
description: Shinobi Saga is a one-life mini RPG with roguelite elements and interactive turn-based combat. Choose your Ninja team and embark on a journey into the wilderness to defeat evil spirits and save your village.

name: Pastor's Lake: The Game
description: Pastor Lake - plunge into the atmosphere of a holiday village. Explore the world, complete quests, collect mushrooms or melt a sauna! You are free in your choice

name: Fairies Praying To Heaven 2: Great Devil's Return Match

name: Forest Fantasy
description: Welcome to the enchanting world of Forest Fantasy, a delightful walking simulator that invites you to embark on a whimsical journey through a magical forest filled with surprises, wonders, and relaxing atmosphere!

name: Spy Guy Hidden Objects: Deluxe Edition
description: Venture out on a colorful and hand-drawn adventure with Spy Guy! Travel between cities in search of clues and don't let the bad guys get away with the treasures! Will you manage to find them all? Explore the detective world of the bravest Treflik the detective and help him save Treflik City.

name: Ominous Obscurity
description: Ominous Obscurity is a single-player horror adventure game set in places from the protagonist's childhood. Solve interesting puzzles, while hiding from insidious horrors waiting for you in the shadows.

name: Greenwood Falls
description: Embark on a crazy cozy journey to find medicine for your father.

name: Pacific Drive: We Have Liftoff Customization Pack
description: Get ready to blast off with this customization pack for Pacific Drive, including additional items themed around space exploration, that you can use to customize your station wagon.

name: The Chalice of Illusion
description: Figure it out yourself! Observe, experiment and test your assumptions about an unorthodox magic system as you attempt to outmaneuver, swindle and topple your demise in the discovery-oriented "castlebrainia" mystery puzzle adventure.

name: Kira Legends
description: Experience an Action Packed RPG as you slay monsters with mastered sword combat and Unleash Your Inner Dragon abilities as you take on the form of both human and Dragon. Kill off all the Demons as you make your way from your peaceful Hometown to the depths of the Underworld.

description: 'EOPN - Test RS' is a true test from the French Air & Space Force, turned into a sci-fi turn-based strategy game set in a nebulous future. Train for your selections or just enjoy the dive in this immersive experience where the goal is to take the best decisions to survive.

name: South Scrimshaw: Part Two
description: South Scrimshaw, Part Two continues the story of one life in a vast alien ocean. It is a richly illustrated experimental visual novel, written in the style of a nature documentary.

name: Megalotrain
description: Megalotrain is a roguelike game designed to offer a swift gaming experience, ideal for players seeking quick challenges and the thrill of progressing as far as possible in a single session, with the potential to complete it in under an hour.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: CG-4A Collector Plane
description: Military gliders, as a mass phenomenon, belong almost entirely to the World War II era.

name: The Little Baby
description: Once upon a time, an orphan named Mary was left on the door step of a humble mouse family's home. She was raised as a mouse, but one fateful day she met the mysterious Edgar, who changed her life forever. This is a love story of Mary and her first love.

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Flying Circus - Volume III
description: Flying Circus: Volume III expands the WWI aerial lineup to the early war period, when the war in the skies was even more novel and precarious and the flying machine designs were sometimes built with audacity and blind luck rather than engineering thought.

name: Farm Invaders
description: Farm Invaders is a casual, roguelite, bullet hell featuring Daisy, an angry cow seeking revenge for her abducted friend. Join Daisy and her furious friends as they try to uncover the secrets of this alien invasion.

name: Summoneer
description: Summoneer is a platformer and puzzle game, where you engineer your own designs.

name: Fist Food
description: One-button arcade score chaser. Grow and shrink your fist to combo your way to victory. Eat all insects as quickly as possible before the day runs out, otherwise it's game over.

name: Inka Aventura: Saga de Pachakutiq
description: Inka Adventure is a platform-type video game set in the time of Prince Cusi Yupanqui, the Inka prince who would become the legendary Inka Pachakutiq, the Inka who transformed the Inka lordship into an entire Empire.

name: Driveland
description: In a peaceful world bathed in beautiful sunsets, find your place among the bad boys. Engage in missions and enjoy a vast selection of cars among your friends. However, don't forget to relax, have fun, and forge your path into adventure.

name: The District VR
description: Enter The District VR, where Berlin's music and nightlife come alive. Aspiring DJ or seasoned pro, the decks await your touch in this immersive multiplayer world. Explore, create, and lose yourself in the rhythm.

name: Galactico

name: Russian Soul Simulator
description: Russian Soul Simulator is a meditative game that allows the player to look at the Russian nature and the surrounding world in realistic graphics. The game allows the hero to move freely through fields and forests, explore the surrounding terrain and interact with various objects.

name: Soul Runner
description: The walls change as you play! You wake up in an ever changing labyrinth that you must escape from. Don't let the monsters get you though.

name: Look At Me
description: Stealth into social media life in the humorous universe of "Look at Me" which takes you on an adventure to destroy the fake posters of his notorious Uncle who became an evil influencer.

name: Miss Paint
description: "Miss Paint" is a puzzle platformer game that takes place inside a nostalgic computer interface where you can use image editing tools such as rotate, resize, copy, move, and rectangle to edit the levels themselves and lead Miss Paint to victory by touching the color green!

name: Home In Alien
description: Welcome to Home In Alien, a 2D sandbox survival and construction game where you'll play as a human survivor on his own in a strange and dangerous alien world, battling with various factions, building and operating his own colony, and exploring and unraveling the mysteries of the planet.

name: Christmas Present
description: Christmas Present is a fun and Christmas game in which you control Santa Claus. You're flying a reindeer-drawn sled across the sky and throwing presents down chimneys. This game is filled with kindness and Christmas spirit, making you enjoy Christmas with Santa.

description: From the romantic star period, to the first class star show, to all kinds of strange foreign star show, from the time of the star to the sky. Various types of new businesses such as alcoholic beverages,Operate a restaurant, seeds, cultivated animals, wine, love, customer openings, exhibitions, etc.

name: The Forgotten Villages of Gondomayit 2" Kost Karangsari
description: Bagas, a native of Yogyakarta, is a vocational school student who lost a bet and received a challenge from his friends, he had to test his courage in one of the boarding houses in Gondomayit Village, whose residents had long been abandoned after the eruption of Mount Merapi.

name: Rainbow fighter
description: This is a fast-paced flying shooting game.

name: Satori
description: Satori is a Hack & slash game made as a final Master Degree project. Immerse yourself in a world of samurai and mystical creatures in this Japanese Hack & Slash. Master deadly skills as you unleash mayhem and honour in epic battles.

name: Flip Flop
description: A strategy-based elimination game centered around flipping colors.

name: Heart
description: "Heart" is a rhythm defense game where players protect the heart of love. Using precise reactions and rhythm, they wield a sword to fend off attacks synced to musical beats from all directions. Evade or counteract each attack in time with the rhythm, testing reaction speed and rhythm sense.

name: Shadows in Silence
description: Shadows in Silence is a 4 vs 1 multiplayer horror game. One player takes on the role of the killer - the witch Elliana and her cat named Sharm. And the other four players play as survivors trying to neutralize the killer.

name: Farmer's Diary
description: There is a lot of work to be done on this farm, a long-term adventure awaits you where you can take farming, orcharding and animal husbandry to the next level with your friends.

name: Hydroneer: Journey to Volcalidus
description: Sail across the sea to Volcalidus, where a new adventure awaits. This expansion delivers new mechanics to the game to aid you in your mining expedition - from huge new vehicles, to interesting new progression systems.

name: ContractVille
description: Start almost penniless and create your own journey. Demolish, build, decorate and purchase your own land. Build your own design, decorate and sell by auction. Create your own company and do all of this with your friends up to 4 players CO-OP in an open-world.

name: Gardener
description: In Gardener, every leaf matters. Unveil the potential of the next-gen virtual garden🥕. Plant and maintain accurately simulated gardens, made of your own procedurally generated plant species. Discover, grow and shape unlimited species. Become a Gardener of Tomorrow‍.

name: Evil Dungeon
description:
Evil Dungeon is an RPG-based fantasy dungeon crawler for the C64.

The story of Alrik, a young adventurer who has to master his first quest.
Fight against monsters, search for treasures, and plan your next steps to escape the Evil Dungeon labyrinth.

name: Evil Dungeon II
description:
Evil Dungeon II - Alrik's Revenge is the sequel to EVIL DUNGEON (C64) by Gregor Schillinger, an RPG-based fantasy story dungeon crawler for the Commodore 64.

The story of Alrik, a young adventurer seeking revenge for his parents who got killed by a group of orcs. Again he has to explore a deadly maze full of monsters, adventure, and secrets!

name: Zombie Shot
description: Zombie Shot is a simple and addicting zombie shooting game with HQ graphics.

name: Sunray OS
description: You just bought a PC, only to discover it once belonged to someone who has mysteriously disappeared. You soon realize that the key to find him may be hidden deep inside your OS, governed by a weird chatbot named Zippy. What will be your first move?

name: Heroes of the Citadel
description: Step into Heroes of the Citadel to save the world. A casual squad RPG game with a rooster of dozens of characters to collect. Fight in many modes selecting a team of 6 to best suit your preferred game tactic. Win both single-player campaigns and multiplayer brawls. Save the world and have fun!

name: SIGame
description:
SIGame is an intellectual quiz in which everyone can test their knowledge and reaction speed and fight against opponents.

Game rules are very simple: all questions in the game are divided into themes, and each question in the theme has its own price. Each player has a personal score, which at the beginning of the game is 0. A question is presented, after which a frame appears on the screen indicating that you can press the button and answer. If the player knows the answer, he/she can press the red button. The player who presses the button earlier than others (and will not have a false start), gives an answer. If the answer is correct, the question price is added to the player's score; otherwise - the price is substracted from the score. In the latter case, other players can try their luck and press the button to answer.

The game can also have a final round in which each of the players makes a bet. A question is asked, time is given for thinking, and each of the players submits their answer to the host. After that, the correct answer is announced, and each of the players receives or loses money according to their bet.

Game winner is the player with the highest score after the last question.

name: Knight of Valour 3 HD
description: Knights of Valour 3 HD is a remaster solely designed to showcase the custom Polygame Master 3 (PGM3) arcade engine. It was published for PC by Tencent on 2014 exclusively for the Chinese market.

name: Spongebob Squarepants: Clash of Triton
description:
After being freed by SpongeBob, Triton captures King Neptune and everyone else at the Krusty Krab, and SpongeBob and Patrick try to sneak into the Krusty Krab to free everyone. Triton then transforms Bikini Bottom into Mount Triton and turns all the Krabby Patties into monsters while sending SpongeBob and Patrick down the mountain.

During their failed mission they find the tridents of King Neptune and Queen Amphitrite, which gives SpongeBob and Patrick new powers, such as super strength. The two then start climbing the mountain, fighting their way to the summit in hopes of rescuing the captives and defeating Triton.

name: O! Holy Knight
description: O! Holy Knight is a survivors game that focuses on controlling a fantasy medieval squad of knights to survive waves of monsters.

name: Cherry Bomb
description: Cherry Bomb is a basic arcade Shoot 'em up game (Shmup) reminiscent of Space Invaders or Galaga. Pilot your red spaceship to blast your way through 9 waves of attacking aliens.

name: Air Delivery
description: You’re a sky-island delivery worker delivering mail to all the nearby islands. Everything runs smoothly until the letters suddenly aren’t being delivered. Find all of the letters and deliver them to their recipients. Maybe they’ll give you something as a thank you.

name: Gamma Protocol
description: Survive waves of enemies on a hostile alien world and contend with random modifiers every 10 seconds. Find new weapons scattered across the map. Watch your stats and try to use the most optimal damage type. How many waves will you survive?

name: Klax
description:
This is a pico-8 port of Klax, mainly based on the Atari Lynx version, featuring:

-100 levels
-5 different backgrounds
-warps
-full klax combos and scoring system.

name: The Luckiest in the Megaverse
description: Will you join the Lucky Club? Are you the Luckiest in the Megaverse? Find out in this mind-blowing clicker game where only luck matters.

name: Section-Z
description:
The NES Port of Section-Z, a side-view shoot-'em-up by Capcom originally released in arcades in 1985. The gameplay of the game can be described as a mixture of Metroid and Life Force.

The game consists of 3 levels of which each has 20 sections. Not all of the sections are required to visit to beat the game.

name: Atomic Heart: Trapped in Limbo
description: The Trapped in Limbo DLC is included in the Atomic Pass. Requires the base game Atomic Heart to run.Continue the story by coming back to the mad world of Limbo! Get through a combat extravaganza and Limbo-flavored challenges to learn P-3&rsquos fate.

name: J and the Sewer World
description: J accidentally kicks a ball, sending it into the manhole. Determined to recover it, he decides to enter the sewer. However, upon exploring the place, he realizes that the ball is not where he imagined, leading him into a restless search throughout the sewer.

name: Plastic Beach
description: Plastic Beach (not to be confused with the Escape To Plastic Beach) was a web-based adventure game available through Gorillaz.com from 2010-2016. In the game, you are an unnamed visitor of the island, who is tasked with assisting Murdoc on various different missions throughout the island.

name: Karate Champ
description: Single players compete against a computer opponent while two players fight each other in this Karate game. Players each use two joysticks which allow for a variety of different moves. The best two matches, out of three, wins.

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III - Season 2
description:
Survive the decay: After Konni Group infiltrated a Mediterranean island, conducting nefarious experiments that have recently — and catastrophically — changed Fortune’s Keep forever, it’s up to you and your squad to survive the decay, battling and hunting down the undead infiltrating every part of Season 2’s colossal content offering! Help is at hand, as Sheriff Deputy Rick Grimes from AMC’s The Walking Dead and CIA Station Chief Kate Laswell headline the Season 2 Battle Pass.

Expect a truly immense content offering, including new Multiplayer maps, four new weapons, Aftermarket Parts (including your own underbarrel chainsaw!), Ranked Play for both Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III and Call of Duty: Warzone, new Zombies Dark Aether Rift investigations, events, challenges, secrets, and a skeletal theme to BlackCell, led by the mysterious John Doe Operator.

CONTENT SUMMARY:

- A massive Multiplayer map offering! Four new Core 6v6 maps arrive across Season 2, including three brand-new 6v6 maps and a fan-favorite remaster.
- Two map variants: Ready up for Hordepoint and the Vortex Mid-Season Playlist, explore two otherworldly themed map variants based on Skidrow and Terminal.
- New War map: Assault a downtown Urzikstan skyscraper from the skies. Welcome to Operation Tin Man.
- Five game modes and a Vortex Playlist: Bring home a win in Team Gun Game; quickscope your way to victory in Snipers Only; enjoy the return of Hordepoint and Bounty; and battle rival Juggernauts in the Juggermosh pit!
- Season 2 Ranked Play: Claim the Ranked Play rewards you unlocked in Season 1, then continue the grind with a full season and all-new rewards to earn.
- New Ninja Vest: Favoring those knives only? Equip the Ninja Vest for silent running, as well as a bonus knife and throwing star ammo.

do you know how to play this fast-paced speed ball game? The game mechanic is very simple. The quick ball will get through colored barrier. The Levels for this Hack were originally planned for Star Revenge 8 before Star Revenge 8 got reworked,

name: Esports Manager 2024
description: Welcome to Esports Manager! Dive into competitive gaming, manage your team, navigate the player market, build an unbeatable squad, and compete in tournaments. Elevate player skills, forge connections, and lead your team to victory. Ready to become the ultimate Esports Manager? The game is on!

name: Fledglings
description: Crash landed on an alien archipelago, you must raise native Fledglings to fight off waves of sea creatures at night. Collect Fledglings, scavenge for resources, and survive the nights with the help of your companions.

name: Undulations
description: This is a survival escape action game from a huge wave where you can experience fear and despair within the first minute. The goal is to run around freely in 3D space from a first-person perspective and avoid large waves. The joy of conquering a huge wave is immeasurable.

name: Spirit Guardians
description: Spirit Guardians is a pixel-art roguelike game. A life-and-death battle is unfolding between light and darkness in the spirit realm. Take on the role of the guardian, continually strengthen yourself, and repel the onslaught of the evil spirit legion. Are you ready to embark on this endless journey?

name: Ragdoll Wreckage: Zombie Farts
description: Side-scrolling game where you employ both your flatulence and structures around you to collect points for victory!

name: Just Roll
description: Embark on "Just Roll", a 3D strategy and skill adventure developed passionately in Unreal Engine. Overcome challenging levels and reveal if you have what it takes to master the art of rolling. Discover a world of dynamic gameplay and stunning visuals!

name: Ignited in Cavern
description: In the waning years of the Northern Wei Dynasty, in the town of Dunhuang, a rumor circulates about a stone statue that bestows blessings in the mortal realm. Anu and Chu Qingqing, rushes to this place only to discover that the merchant holding the stone statue has already met his demise.

name: Evergreen South
description: Multiplayer or Co-op survival game to play with friends and family. Build what you desire or build with templates from the our workshop! Tame animals, kill beasts. Live like the real world!

name: Super: Taxi Simulation
description: Explore the city in 'sUper: Taxi Simulation'! Navigate busy streets, pick up diverse passengers, and customize your cab. Balance speed and safety, tackle traffic and day-night cycles. Thrive in this dynamic taxi driving adventure. Ready, set, drive!

name: Mole Royal
description: Get ready for an adrenaline-pumping, in "Mole Royal" - the ultimate whack-a-mole experience. Race against the clock, and prove your whacking skills in this ultimate arcade experience!

name: Vermilion Arcade: Horror Collection
description: Vermilion Arcade is a collection of 8+ horror games inside a surreal and mysterious arcade.

name: House of Shadows
description: House of Shadows is a gripping thriller through the eyes of detective Alexia, who bursts into a mysterious village invites you into a horror experience.Players will investigate in-depth and make difficult decisions and try to solve mysterious events in the depths of the cursed village of Unheilsdorf

name: Car Mechanic Simulator 2021: Rims
description: Rims DLC is a pack of 80 unique brand new rims with some color variations.

name: Scuttle
description: Scuttle across the sands in an exhilarating musically charged adventure. Groove to the beat to jump and boost your way through treacherous dunes and risky seas in this mesmerizing 3D platformer with rhythm game elements.

name: Dead by Daylight: Maddening Darkness Pack
description: Danger lurks in the Maddening Darkness Pack, which includes 8 playable characters from 4 of Dead by Daylight's most twisted Chapters yet: Of Flesh And Mud, Spark Of Madness, Curtain Call, and Shattered Bloodline.

name: Gas Station Story
description: A surreal slice-of-life about a mysterious computer virus and its effects on the city you live in. Navigate day-to-day decisions, fall in love with your coworker, and alienate your customers by being rude in this dystopian desert ring-‘em-up — featuring graphics created with a Game Boy Camera!

name: Grapple Tanks
description: Traverse dynamic terrains and engage in an endless deathmatch with a grappling-hook-equipped tank. Outlast and outmaneuver your opponents in Grapple Tanks, a 2D multiplayer shooter game playable with up to 4 people.

name: Nonograms
description: Nonograms is a relaxing puzzle game where you use logic and creativity. Your goal is to reveal hidden pictures by filling in specific grid cells, based on numerical clues provided for each row and column. The games in this genre are also known as Picross, Griddlers, Pic-a-Pix, Hanjie, etc.

name: Inside SCP-167
description: Inside SCP-167 is a first-person psychological horror game that combines investigation and puzzle-solving. Take on the role of Alex, the most experienced agent of the SCP Foundation, and explore a labyrinth of cubic rooms in order to put an end to a growing evil that is spreading throughout the area

name: Search All: Flies
description: Is a hidden object game in which you need to find all the flies in a large location. The flies will be located in a variety of places, from the most prominent to barely noticeable places. The entire game location looks lively because of the animation elements

name: MorphaVerse
description: Explore the world of MorphaVerse, collect and train monsters for your team. Use cards to support your monsters in battle!

name: Loot Improvement
description: Loot Improvement is a topdown roguelike in which you try to collect as much loot as possible. Use the upgrade system to improve your loot. Find optimal paths to collect as much loot as possible.

name: Woodland Sonata
description: Embark on an odyssey where music weaves the tale. In this enchanting world, become a musician bestowed with a mystical flute, unraveling puzzles and mysteries. Command nature's elements, control animals, and shape the landscape with your melodies.

name: Master of Pieces Jigsaw Puzzles: In Dreams
description: Dreams can be different… Fairy tales, childhood memories, unknown words, just feelings or… what is your dream? Mega pack of this Dreamy DLC contains 54 fantasy, unusual and magic pictures to inspire your own dreams

name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Achtung Spitfire! Campaign
description: The Achtung Spitfire! campaign story is inspired by historical events, while its 20 missions have fictional circumstances and use randomization to increase replayability.

name: Dice TD
description: Dice TD is a board-themed tower defense game with fantasy dice, instead of towers. Merge your dice to increase their pips and powers. Defend your base from the incoming enemies and construct epic mazes to slow them down.

name: Joe Mama
description: Joe Mama offers a unique blend of puzzle-solving and mind bending art style! Dive into the tale of the legendary furry figure, Joe Mama, as you navigate intricate puzzles, survive challenging environments, and unravel the captivating mysteries of his world.

name: Moai
description: Rip around Easter Island on your scooter, take lots of photos, learn from ancient writings, and discover who carved each Moai in this puzzling island adventure!

name: Network Engineer Simulator
description: In Network Engineer Simulator you are hired to do the unenviable job of cleaning up data closets. You will visit various locations from small closets to large data centers where you will need to untangle and organize these server racks and ensure various services are operational.

name: Lucifer Lives in Lower Manhattan
description: Lucifer Lives in Lower Manhattan is a 1940s Crime Noir Murder Mystery Visual Novel with non-linear game play and a subtle love letter to classic adventure games of the 80s and 90s.

name: Phantasia
description: Spooky PHantasy survival game! Collect and Conjure spells to Escape your Nightmare

name: Solar Storm
description: Solar Storm is a classic turn-based artillery shooter. You are a tank pilot, fighting for control over the solar system. Battle your friends in a fully destructible terrain to see who is the best!

name: Into the Backrooms: Last Tape
description: "Into the Backrooms: Last Tape" transports players into a dark and eerie world of the Backrooms. Immerse yourself in an atmospheric horror experience, explore procedurally generated labyrinths, and uncover the secrets lurking in the dark corners.

name: The Cooking Class First Course
description: The Cooking Class - First Course, is a story driven short game whose main goal is to help the player to see the bigger picture behind the franchise.

name: Fish Folk: Jumpy
description: Fish Folk is a tactical 2D shooter, played by 2-4 players online or on a shared screen. Aim straight left or right; the rest is up to clever movement and timing in this fish-on-fish brawler!

name: Fragmented World
description: Reconnect a fragmented world by switching between two perspectives – one for exploration and another for manipulating the fragmented world. Overcome intermediate levels where you'll need to employ lateral thinking and make decisions. Can you once again unite a decadent and broken world?

name: Foodie novice village
description: Set up your own farm, venture into the forest, find precious recipes and ingredients, enjoy the food you grow, and taste different foods in different scenes.

name: Lay of the Land
description: Lay of the Land is a sandbox adventure game set in a fantasy world where everything is physically simulated. Use the environment to your advantage and Explore, Fight, Loot and Build your way through mysterious lands.

name: Offworlders
description: A retro-futuristic single player survival RPG where you control a hand-picked team of 4 separate characters; each with their own unique specializations, attributes, and inventories.

name: Hellopoly
description: Jump into a colorful world of business demons, risky high-height platforming, and full-on epic adventure in Hellopoly: the world's greatest corporate demon adventure platformer!

name: Goofy Goober Simulator
description: Blast and crash through hordes of dangerous "zombies" as the titular "Goofy Goober" in this "video game". Collect Powerful items, obtain Powerful weapons, and defeat Powerful monsters in quickly paced action combat encounters. But Watch Out

name: Melting Passion
description: A Business Micromanagement Adventure. Create lucidity for money, fight monsters for resources, and find out why you're in this world.

name: Hidden Cats In Old City Block
description: Find cute cats in the quiet and cozy old city block. Can you find them? Meow Meow...Kittens are calling you！

name: Infinite Dissonance
description: A Roguelite, Co-op, turn-based strategy, dungeon crawling game, where you can journey with friends into randomly generated dungeons to fight enemies, collect loot and improve your powers.

name: Warden of Time
description: Manipulate time to your whim! Use your powers of time manipulation to advance in this 2D puzzle adventure!

name: Apple II Sudoku
description: A Sudoku game for Apple II.

name: Kitty
description: Run, jump and eat burgers to fill your empty belly, but watch out! If you get catched, you will loose!

name: Hospital 666
description:
A Single and Multi-player Horror Game.

You wake up in an endless hospital.
You can only use the front or rear elevator.

If you see something strange, turn back.
If you see something strange, turn back.
If you see something strange, turn back.

What will you find on floor 666?

description: The Left Hand of Rosalina is an intermediate kaizo rom hack of Super Mario World by Buzbee and GrumpyWalrus.

description: Start the Skibidi Toilet battle and claim as much territory as you can with your toilet. Beware of the other Skibidi Toilets as they have their own territories and are able to break your toilet in a direct collision or just roll across your wet trail.

name: Push The Cat with WASD
description: A cat-pushing puzzle game where narratives are puzzle levels. With an emotional story and a little bit of 4th wall breaking. By pushing the cat, you are pushing the cat to think, to remember why they are stuck in this game...

name: Oshi no Ko Quiz

name: Crazy Hospital Fushigi no Kuni no Tenshi
description: The player controls a young man who feels sick and has to visit the hospital. Once there, the plot split into different paths, depending on the choices of locations, dialogue responses and actions made by the player. All the branches involve focusing on one of the several available female characters and pursuing the short courting process to the point of its intimate conclusion.

name: Daisy Quest and Daisy's Castle
description: Daisy Quest is an educational game intended for young children. The goal is to find the titular dragon Daisy in a magical game of hide-and-seek. While you explore the world, you come across various simple mini-games intended to test your knowledge of vowel and consonant sounds. When each mini-game is completed, a treasure will be collected which reveals part of Daisy's hiding spot. After all of the treasures have been collected, the player wins the game by finding Daisy at the revealed location.

You can only make the balloon go up or down. The balloon will move right or left depending on the air flows.

name: Tecmo Bowl
description:
NES port of Tecmo Bowl which was also released in Arcades as part of the Nintendo PlayChoice-10 machine.

Through the NFLPA license, each roster mimics that of the NFL team based out of the same city or state. Tecmo Bowl only uses players from twelve of the best and most popular teams of the time.

Two NES versions were released in the U.S. The first is identified by its black and gold seal of quality, Eric Dickerson as running back, and Albert Bentley as a kick returner for Indianapolis. The second is identified by its white and gold seal, Albert Bentley as running back, and Clarence Verdin as a kick returner.

name: Tecmo Bowl

name: Sleepless
description: A horror game set in an abandoned bunker in Russia, inspired by "The Russian Sleep Experiment." Players must collect important papers from past experiments, but the bunker is difficult to navigate with locked corridors, no electricity, and a constant feeling of being watched.

name: Idle Champions: Feywild Fen Skin & Feat Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Fen (if you don't already own them) Feywild Fen Skin An Epic Feat for Fen 7 Gold Fen Chests 1 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Card 6 Epic Blacksmithing Contracts 6 Epic Bounty Contracts

name: Idle Champions: Mind Flayer Karlach Theme Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Karlach (if you don't already have them) Mind Flayer Karlach Skin An Exclusive Familiar An Epic Feat for Karlach 1 Epic Potion of the Gem Hunter 16 Gold Karlach Chests with 2 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Cards

name: Idle Champions: Xalimnos the Xorn Familiar Pack
description: In this pack: Xalimnos the Xorn Familiar 4 Epic Potions of Speed 4 Epic Potions of Giant's Strength 4 Epic Potions of Clairvoyance 1 Potion of Polish
