description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Presto (if you don't already have them) Mythic Presto Skin An Exclusive Familiar An Epic Feat for Presto 1 Epic Potion of the Gem Hunter 16 Gold Presto Chests with 2 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Cards

name: Pixeline Skolehjælp: Lær om Vikingerne – Kongekampen
description: Sin descripción

name: Buddies
description: Buddies is a party game where you and your friends are forced to reveal secrets that you have kept hidden for years. Which of you is the best cook? Which of you will start tearing up first while watching a moving film? All secrets will come to light, and you will surely learn something new about yourself.

name: Pixeline Skolehjælp: Sikker på Cykel – Byens Bedste Bud
description: Sin descripción

name: Pixeline Skolehjælp: Lær at Stave – Stavning eller kaos
description: Sin descripción

name: Treasure Hunter for Pico
description: Treasure Hunter for Pico is a game exclusively for Pico VR headset users.

name: Rabbit and Turtle
description: A 3D action game where you control a turtle, use magic and items on the field, and aim to reach the goal before the rabbit does.

name: Something Something Spaceship
description: Explore a malfunctioning spaceship and retrieve the items needed to fix it, while avoiding a colourful cast of enemies. An isometric platform puzzler inspired by games from the 8-bit era.

name: Ghost Janitors
description: Ghost Janitors is a multiplayer psychological horror game for 1-4 players. Your job? Cleaning haunted houses while avoiding terrifying monsters. Ready to face the spine-tingling challenge with your team?

name: The Mom
description: This game puts you in the shoes of a dedicated mother uses her magical powers, your mission is to care for your home and children by cooking, cleaning, and caring, ensuring their needs are met and their happiness is preserved, But don’t forget the mother! this will be your double challenge!

name: Mucorales
description: An enthralling RPG Maker horror game that explores a dark and twisted rendition of the classic fairy tale, Red Riding Hood.

name: Pixeline Skolehjælp: Dinosaurer – De Frygtelige Øgler
description: Sin descripción

name: Pixeline Skolehjælp: Learning English – Money or Nothing
description: Sin descripción

name: Pixeline Skolehjælp: Dansk – Kaos i Kommakøbing
description: Sin descripción

name: Pixeline Skolehjælp: Matematik – Tåger over Talstrup
description: Sin descripción

name: DURT
description: Dig into this block-based puzzle game where you must master the elements of the subterranean world to rescue the miners trapped within. The deeper you delve, the more challenging the rescue becomes.

name: Batman Saw Game
description: Help Batman rescue Batgirl from the evil game of Pigsaw!

name: Instruction
description:
Instruction is a story based clicker game where you, an employee of a power plant, are tasked with generating power for your city. The powerplant's built in intelligence mentor program, or I.M.P. for short, will help you generate the necessary amount of voltage to fulfill your quota. I.M.P may have developed a little too much of a personality for the powerplant's liking, but don't worry! It's still more than capable of keeping you on track.

In this game you'll be tasked with using different systems to generate power. Each system works differently and can be upgraded to increase your efficiency. Discover each of the power plant's mechanisms, and uncover the story behind your less than friendly companion.

name: Train Depart
description: This is a short, atmospheric psychological horror prototype where you play as a 16-year-old boy experiencing his first long train ride. You can interact with strangers on the train, play games, and do routine things that people do during train trips.

name: Room Escape: Strange Case 2
description:
Can you escape from Asylum?

In Strange Case 2: Asylum you need to investigate the mysterious case about mental hospital.

name: Stolen Hearts: Wolf Knight
description: Stolen Hearts: Wolf Knight is an action-adventure precision/puzzle platformer. Dash your way through challenging obstacles. Fight off the enemies. Find the lost Hearts. Guide them safely home. Defeat the Wolf King and his minions. Collect hard-to-get fireflies along the way.

name: Mr. Kougar
description: Platformer

name: ABC World
description: An educational spelling game.

name: Granny Applebee's Cookie Factory
description: Granny Applebee's Cookie Factory is an educational managerial program.

name: Hugo Hound's Vowel Sounds
description:
Hugo Hound's Vowel Sounds is a single-player game to help children learn vowel sounds.

The player chooses from long or short vowels, and there are four different question types. The player receives animated quizzes where they try to correctly identify the missing vowel in a word.

name: Uncle Clyde's Consonant Slides
description:
Uncle Clyde's Consonant Slides is a single-player game to help children learn consonant sounds.

The player chooses from 3 lists of different consonant sounds, and there are four different question types. The player receives animated quizzes where they try to correctly identify the missing consonant starting a word.

name: Tsuzuku Sekai to Wakarebana
description:
A man attends the funeral of his fiancé.

A short BL visual novel with dark atmosphere.

name: Kowareta Sekai wo Kimi to Iku
description:
In a desolate world, there were two men.
There was a man with curly orange hair and a man wearing a cloak.
The orange-haired man rolled his eyes. As if he had seen something unbelievable, as if he had seen a ghost, he was very surprised. But soon his expression changes to one of joy. His lips curled into a smile, and he ran closer to the cloaked man.

A apocalyptic sci-fi BL visual novel about two men who met in a broken world.

name: Shapes and Patterns
description:
Shapes and Patterns is a series of educational games for the Apple II.

-Which is Different? - The player must select which of 4 shapes are different

-Pattern Match - The player is shown a pattern of 4 shapes, and must be matched to an identical pattern

-Memory Match - The player looks at a pattern, and then must match that pattern from a list of 4 patterns.

name: Shinda Classmate kara Koibumi ga Todoita.
description:
I got a letter from my dead classmate.
It was a wonderful love letter.
It said he loved me.

name: Ao to Ao no Sekai
description: Ran and Ao are brothers. Apparently, Ao is being bullied at school...

name: Jirai-kei Menhera Danshi to Icha Love Pien Ichigo Tabetaai
description:
When he woke up in the morning, Menhera was in the room.
Apparently Menhera was invading the room without permission!
The protagonist is being followed and bothered by him, but for some reason he can't let go of him...
The main character is swayed by Menhera today as well!?

A menhera BL visual novel.

name: Kingyo no Kodou
description:
When I woke up from a nap, the classroom was bathed in the colors of dusk.
In the orange classroom, a strange boy suddenly confessed that he loves me.
Why does the boy called Shuri like me...?

name: Sensei, Issho ni Kitekuremasu ka?
description:
The protagonist, Shigenobu Aoki, is a teacher with the goal of “being a teacher who can be close to his students.”
Aoki is curious about a student named Saki Furukawa who's in his class this year, who had suffered severe injuries to his face. When he asked the other teachers, it seems that Furukawa is "always like that".
Thinking that it’s strange that he's always injured, Aoki tries to talk to Furukawa, but...

name: Shinigami Killer
description:
October 31st is Alvin's birthday.
His childhood friend, Chloe, celebrates Alvin's birthday every year. But Alvin really hates Chloe.

A short BL visual novel. Just two guys talking on Halloween night.

name: Blink Blonk
description: Sin descripción

name: Memory Visiting
description:
Visiting the last memories of you and me.
You were always in my memory.

A short BL visual novel.

name: Saihate Enabler
description:
Takayuki is a caring and helpful person. He always delivered notes and handouts used in class to his childhood friend Hikaru, who was a shut-in and didn't go to school.

Because Hikaru is shy and timid, he needs me to accompany him.
Feeling this way, Takayuki heads to Hikaru's house today to take care of Hikaru...

A short BL visual novel about psychological dependence.

name: La Boîte à Bidules de l'Oncle Ernest
description: La Boite à Bidule is an adventure game featuring a wide range of mini-games, based on reflexion, observation, dexterity and celerity. The entire story takes place in some kind of magical box created by Uncle Albert, containing living and talking toys. It's a game produced by Éric Viennot and developed by Lexis Numérique. Released in 2002, it's the first entry in a spin-off series derived from Uncle Albert's Adventures, aimed at a young demography of around 5 to 8 years old.

name: A Time Traveller's Guide to Past Delicacies
description: A short game about a fictional time traveler raiding the past to steal recipes.

name: The jump guys
description: A physics-based platformer. 40 levels to pass. 12 fight arenas. Play with friends by local multiplayer or online multiplayer for up to 4 players

name: Seers of Ages Past 1: The Harbinger of Mah
description: Seers of Ages Past 1: The Harbinger of Mah is a third-person, open-world Action RPG that tells the story of the summoner Tarbeard, the first Seer, who battles fierce and wondrous creatures with his minions on an epic fantasy adventure across the savage swampland of Yvermist.

name: DreaMon World
description: DreaMon World is a modern virtual pet, RPG, adventure. Enter a realm filled with mysterious creatures called DreaMon. Nurture, train, and evolve your very own DreaMon friend, all while embarking on a journey to find your way home!

name: Spirit Island: Jagged Earth
description: The battle against the colonizing Invaders rages on! Jagged Earth brings more Spirits, more Powers, and more Island Boards. But the Invaders are more numerous and more capable than ever before. New Adversaries, Events, Fear, and Blight cards add more variety and danger than ever before!

name: Urban Forest
description: Urban Forest is a city building deckbuilder. Use different cards to build up your city to gain support to win the mayor election.

name: OuterRealm
description: Play as a Elite soldier in ironclad atomic power armor, collect powerful weapons, crush endless waves of voidborn horrors and step into the realm portal, to finish their demigod masters. An old school FPS,collect items,unlock powerful upgrades,kill boss,find exits,and endless mode.

name: Envious
description: Experience the horror puzzle game, Envious, offering both single player and co-op modes. Choose to be Xavier or Xandra where the first is trapped in a house, trying to escape it, while Xandra explores a separate old house to uncover clues facilitating Xavier's escape.

name: Late Night Drift
description: Are you ready to embark on the drift adventure of a lifetime? Gather your crew, rev up your engines, and become the Drift Masters.

name: The Children of The Woods: Lost Tape
description: Playable trailer for the upcoming horror found footage movie "The Children of The Woods"

name: Punk Juice
description: Join a band with two crass, potty-mouthed punks, Ricki and Max. Curate your style, endure the trials and tribulations of public transit, and play dead-end gigs! Go on mediocre dates, thrift with your besties, buy overpriced coffee, and complain about rent in this Seattle-inspired grungy city.

name: Memory Puzzle Adventure
description: Test your visual memory with this casual puzzle game.

name: TentaCat: The Lost Lineage
description: TentaCat: Lost Lineage is a retro 16-bit action platformer where you play as Aqua, a TentaCat separated from his birthplace on a secluded island and wants to find his own kind. Journey through 14 levels, collecting items and power-ups, fighting bosses and unraveling mysteries of the TentaCats.

name: Box Room
description: A fast-paced puzzle adventure where strategy and agility collide!

name: Index: Purger
description: Step into the world of Index-0, and experience a thrill-fueled mercenary life like no other! With fast-paced, chaotic scenarios, you'll need to keep your wits about you to stay in the game. Make use of the equipment and perks at your disposal, and create your own unique style to control the chaos.

name: 7:45, Densha Nite.
description:
A rural train station during the day, where there are people scattered all over the place.
At this time of day, most students were supposed to be at school, but the boy was there.
A boy, wearing a school uniform, looks down at the train tracks from the platform.
The protagonist, who was drunk, called out to the boy.

A short visual novel about the strange friendship between an office worker and a middle school student.

name: Smashfruit
description: Smashfruit is a lighthearted, 2D action-platformer. Play with up to 4 players and work together to gather collectibles and complete courses together!

name: Haiiro no Umi nite Kimi wo Matsu
description:
I walked along the beach in leather shoes, with my feet getting stuck in the sand.
The season is autumn. October. A comfortable temperature, neither hot nor cold.
I was with a third-year senior named Rin Sakuma, walking by the sea, where I couldn't swim because it was out of season.
Perhaps because the weather wasn't so good, the sea was dark and murky, reflecting the gray sky and forming waves.

A sad short BL visual novel about a senior and his junior.

name: Esoria
description: The Lord of the Underworld is back and the fate of Esoria is in your hands. Take on the role of one of the four heroes, collect powerful equipment, learn various skills and defeat Heres, the god of the underworld.

name: Grand Emprise 2: Portals Apart
description: ⛏️ Survival crafting adventure   Through magical portals   Into fantasy worlds  ⚡ Once-in-a-lifetime, high-paced, high-variety  ⏳ The sequel to Grand Emprise: Time Travel ️

name: Pixel Panic
description: Play as Celex Wallacin, and run, climb and celling fling your way through this awesome precision platformer you get to play in early development :D

name: The Upper Downer Complex
description: The Upper Downer Complex is a Game where you are trapped inside your own dream. The Story unfolds around you, the truth is hidden beneath all the layer of dream worlds while you try to not get found by HIM.

name: Kraken Attack!
description: Wreak havoc as the mighty Kraken! Crush cities, swat pesky choppers, and unleash your tentacled fury in this fast-paced arcade smash-fest. Can you handle the chaos?

name: Maneuver
description: Maneuver is a 3D FPP melee action game where you fight by switching characters you manipulate through 'Hacking'. Experience fast tempo combat with strategies through hacking.

name: Necro Rumble
description: Master the dark art of necromancy in a 2D top-down strategy game. Unleash and lead your undead legions to defeat and dominate enemy waves in this action-packed adventure.

name: Versus
description: Versus offers a multiplayer battle experience with your friends. Customize your character with weapons, skins, and strategic modes. Improve your soldiers, earn rewards, and compete with players worldwide for victory!

name: The Void Chronicles: One's Desolation
description: One day, Adele tells her daughter Liridona she's set up an arranged marriage with Prince Nathaniel. Everything seems to be going well between the two until Liridona hears something she shouldn't have from the prince. So, can she escape from Nathaniel's grasp or will she succumb to his persistence?

name: Gravitia
description: Gravitia is an adventure game about manipulating gravity to escape a unique world full of mystery.

name: Impromptu Trip
description: Beautiful tropical islands, rock climbing, driving, bungee jumping, sea riding... Are you ready to start this wonderful trip?
